monogr.title: New Avenues in the Study of the Old Testament: A Collection of Old Testament Studies, Published on the Occasion of the Fiftieth Anniversary of the Oudtestamentisch Werkgezelschap and the Retirement of Prof. Dr. M.J. Mulder

body.bibl: Dirksen, Piet B. “Some Remarks in Connection with the Peshitta of Kings.” In New Avenues in the Study of the Old Testament: A Collection of Old Testament Studies, Published on the Occasion of the Fiftieth Anniversary of the Oudtestamentisch Werkgezelschap and the Retirement of Prof. Dr. M.J. Mulder, edited by Adam S. van der Woude, 22–28. Oudtestamentische Studien 25. Leiden: E.J. Brill, 1989.

Dirksen, Some Remarks in Connection with the Peshitta of Kings, in New Avenues in the Study of the Old Testament: A Collection of Old Testament Studies, Published on the Occasion of the Fiftieth Anniversary of the Oudtestamentisch Werkgezelschap and the Retirement of Prof. Dr. M.J.
